ga්ramiya dhiwara sanwidhana wisin mehi di janadhipathithuma wetha wishesha sandeshayak da bhara dun athara jalashawalata awashya mathsya pataw bahalima wadi kirima, dhiwara aampanna laba ganima, jala jiwi wagawan sa`daha rajaye idam laba ganima, jalashawala widhimath kalamanakaranaya sa`daha niladharin yedawima, dhiwara karmanthaya sa`daha awashya yatithala pahasukam saha mulya pa්rathipadana labadima athu`tha ema siyalu illim kadinamin itu kirimata piyawara ganna bawa pa්rakasha kala janadhipathithuma ema illim itu kirima athu`tha karmanthaye unnathiya wenuwen wadi mudalak mewara aya waya thulin wen kirimata katayuthu karana bawa sa`dahan kale ya.samastha miridiya jiwi ha jalajiwi waga pa්rajawa agayima wenuwen sha්ri lanka jathika jalajiwi waga sanwardhana adhikariya magin mema sammana pa්radanothsawaya sanwidhanaya karanu labayi.
meya mita perath lankawe kriyathmaka wuna.

shri lanka dumriya departhamenthuwa wenuwen departhamenthu prasampadana kamitu sabhapathi wisin pahatha sadahan bhojanagara wasara dekaka kalayakata aaharapana alewi kirime sewawan pawathwagena yama sandahapahatha dakwa athi sudusukam ha palapuruddak lath lansu karuwan wethin mudra thabana lada prasampadana lansupath kandawanu labe. 01.dakunu kaluthara 02.
oba pasupasin nam wegawath wimata gatha haki kriya marga soya balanna.
inpasu albat withanachchi namathi siwil niladhariya me gana purawidya departhamenthuwe baladharinta danum di thibe.

nuwanathi bodhisathwayan wahanseth, dewanuwa yamehi aanisansa menehi karanuye, palamuwa giya pirisa wisin manawin sakasana lada nosama thana sama kota sakasana lada margayehi thama gamana pahasu wimath, palamuwa yana gonun thanakola ka pasuwa wadena lathanakola thama gawayinta himiwimath, thama minisuntada alutha wadunu la palakola aaharayata labimath, jalaya nathi thanhi palamuwa yana pirisa kanina lada thanin pahasuwen jalaya lada haki wimath, itha apahasuwen kala yuthu – keneku maranna wani wu badu mila kirima wisheshayen nokara mulin giya aya wisin panawana lada milatama pahasuwen thama badu wikiniya haki wimath yana karunu salaka dewanuwa yamata ekanga wiya.
namuth mata ehema nayek gasa marenna aasawak nathi nisa pana bayen hiti thana gal gasi hitiyemi.
